oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photograph of Pvt. James Johnston on an Indian Motorcycle
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This photograph shows Johnston in France on an Indian motorcycle with sidecar. He may have been acting as a courier or artillery spotter. He is wearing what appers to be an overseas cap and a heavy military overcoat with a shoulder patch on the left sleeve. A crudely rendered number has been painted on the upper portion of the fuel tank. Johnston served in the Ord. Corps and was attached to the 114th MG Battn., 30th Div.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Johnston, James McFerren
